profile_positions.description:
- Collecting and sorting out the needs of business departments, leading relevant departments to conduct feasibility analysis and research on potential projects.
- Organizing relevant review meetings at each stage of the project, such as project review, requirements review, technical review, test review, pre-online review, etc. 
- Promoting coordination of various departments to provide work products in  accordance with the project plan, and regularly reporting project progress to the management in time. 
- Carrying out risk management of the project, identifying project risks in a timely  manner, and organizing relevant department personnels to respond and feedback on high-risk issues in certain time. 
- Archiving and managing project-related documents according to relevant requirements, mainly related to project reports, project plans, requirements reports, design documents, test documents, go-online plans, training manuals, etc.
organizing relevant department personnels to respond and feedback on  high-risk issues in certain time. 
- Archiving and managing project-related documents according to relevant  requirements, mainly related to project reports, project plans, requirments reports,  design documents, test documents, go-online plans, training manuals, etc. 
- Supporting Public Relations department with the application of ICP for our company. Mainly coordinate between external supplier and internal colleagues in preparation for this application.
profile_positions.title: Project Management Assistant

profile_positions.location: 中国 辽宁 沈阳
profile_positions.description:
- Conducting macro policy analysis to capture regional business opportunities. For  example, studying the “Thirteenth Five-Year Plan of Liaoning Province” associated  with Siemens’ business, collecting potential project information as well as regional  economy development data for the Market Analysis Report“Thirteenth Five-Year Plan  Report of Liaoning Province from the Perspective of Siemens”. 
- Assisting in business intelligence analysis. For example, participating in the  construction of montly business review to provide management team a real-time  economic development status. Monthly business reviews include the most  disctinctive features of that month on new release of important policies, appointment and dismiss of senior government officers, economy indicators, etc. At the end of  2016, having built a profile of Province Liaoning and City Shenyang based on its economy performance respectively. Furthermore, to better display regional economic  elasticity, for the period, we extended the research to the last five years; in  geography, we compared Liaoning and Shenyang with benchmarks both at home and abroad. 
- Participating in market reseaerch. To be more exact, we traced the top 500  companies of the region to seek for potential cooperation and partnership. After a  thorough research of their performances and operation situation, we had a list of  three for further contact. 
- Supporting with the management and maintenance of government-enterprise  relationship by the organization and preparation of meetings, construction of meeting  briefings, thanks letter, newsletter, etc. 
- Office administrative affairs such as travel reimbursement, backup of office  documents, and assistance in managing the official seals of the three northeastern  provinces 
- HR affairs such as arranging and organizing interviews, onboarding, training of  interns.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant

•	In Charge of composing the TA Handbook (Team Assistant Handbook, English version) with both pictures and texts, which includes the first-hand information for newcomers, detailed instructions of general administration work (daily routine work) with exact process of showing how work should be done, helpful tips of office work, etc. 
•	Attending team meetings (also the organizer), writing minutes and sharing contents with other teams by email; attending department meetings.
•	Supporting in organizing workshops, the annual party and conferences.
•	Administration work such as reimbursements, business travel application, booking meeting rooms, arranging time for interviews of international interns.
